abstract: Six Republican presidential candidates have indicated that they may not attend a proposed Univision debate in January because of a dust-up over coverage of Senator Marco Rubio.
snippet: Six Republican presidential candidates have indicated that they may not attend a proposed Univision debate in January because of a dust-up over coverage of Senator Marco Rubio.
lead_paragraph: The Univision network is at an impasse with several Republican presidential candidates that may prevent it from hosting a presidential debate early next year.

headline.main: GOP Candidates and Univision at Odds Over Debate
